sections.heading: CHALLENGESArt. 795. Time for challenges; method; peremptory challenges based on race or gender; restrictionsA
sections.text: A juror shall not be challenged for cause after having been temporarily accepted pursuant to Article 788(A) unless the challenging party shows that the cause was not known to him prior to t
